# status

**Instance Property**

The status of reading sample buffers from the asset.

## Declaration

```swift
var status: AVAssetReader.Status { get }
```

## Discussion

Check the value of this property when the [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVAssetReaderOutput/copyNextSampleBuffer()] method on [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVAssetReaderOutput] returns `nil` to determine why the output can’t read more data.

This property is thread safe.

## Configuring reading

- **timeRange**: The time range within the asset to read.
- **AVAssetReader.Status**: Values that represent the possible states of an asset reader.
- **error**: An error that describes the reason for a failure.
